program main
    implicit none
    character(len=200) :: s  ! assuming a maximum length; adjust as needed
    integer(kind=8) :: k
    integer :: i, n

    read(*,*) s
    read(*,*) k

    do i = 1, k
        if (s(i:i) /= '1') then
            write(*, '(a)') s(i:i)
            stop
        else if (i == k) then
            write(*, '(a)') '1'
            stop
        end if
    end do
end program main
